visual_Stephany module

visual_stephany.plot_graf_bar(df: Series, x: str, y: str, file_name: str)

Plot a bar graphic representing the data in the specified columns.

Parameters:

  • df (pd.DataFrame) – DataFrame containing the data for plotting.

  • x (str) – Column to be used for the x-axis.

  • y (str) – Column to be used for the y-axis.

  • file_name (str) – Name of the file where the plot will be saved.

Returns:

The bar graphic is saved as an image file.

Return type:

None

visual_stephany.plot_graf_pie_by_hour(df: Series, hour: str, file_name: str, column: str)

Plot a pie graphic based on the values in the column for a specific hour.

Parameters:

  • df (pd.DataFrame) – DataFrame containing the data for plotting.

  • hour (str) – Hour of the day to analyze and filter the data.

  • file_name (str) – Name of the file where the plot will be saved.

  • column (str) – Column by which the pie graphic will be grouped and plotted. Must be ‘description’ or ‘priority’

Returns:

The pie graphic is saved as an image file.

Return type:

None

Raises:

KeyError – If the specified column or ‘hour’ does not exist in the DataFrame.
